description: Widespread IndiGo flight cancellations on Saturday left thousands of passengers stranded across India, leading to scenes of frustration and protests at airports. Despite the aviation regulator pausing recent flight duty time limitations, disruptions continued, impacting crucial travel plans for many, including a team selected for the Smart India Hackathon.

Secrets behind Rajinikanth’s Annamalai | Suresh Krissna Interview | This Changed my Life
description:
Director Suresh Krissna, who is known for his four films with Rajinikanth (Annamalai, Veera, Baasha and Baba) and two with Kamal Haasan (Sathya and Aalavandan), is excited that his Annamalai, his first film with Rajinikanth, is re-releasing on December 12, 2025, coinciding with the Superstar’s birthday.

“Back in 1992, fans celebrated the film as if it was their own. The fact that many elements – including friendship, revenge, love and fights – were part of the cinematic package appealed to them. I hope they love it today too.”

In an exclusive with ‘The Hindu’, as part of ‘This Changed my Life’ podcast, the director talks about how Rajinikanth influenced an entire generation and how his films were lapped up.

Interview: Srinivasa Ramanujam
Video: S Shiva Raj
Edit: Johan Sathyadas

Regulators cited deceptive design practices with the blue checkmark system and shortcomings in X's ad database. The ruling has drawn criticism from US officials who view it as an attack on American tech platforms.

Understanding your body's response is key to choosing the optimal sleep structure for well-being.

He also remains open to a fight with Michael Chandler. Contract talks are expected by February 2025. The UFC is finalizing plans for this significant return.

Gurgaon hit-and-run: Businessman killed; 22-year-old unlicensed driver arrested
description: A 58-year-old cyclist was tragically killed in a hit-and-run on Akashneem Marg, Gurgaon. The driver, a 22-year-old unlicensed housekeeping staffer, borrowed a bouncer's car and struck the cyclist from behind before fleeing. CCTV footage aided police in identifying and arresting the driver, who now faces multiple charges.

title: Congress MP Deepender Singh Hooda: ‘The government is in denial over sex ratio in Haryana’
Putin promises non-stop energy, PM says Russia ties like pole star
description: India and Russia reaffirmed their strong ties, signing over a dozen agreements to boost economic partnership to $100 billion by 2030. Both nations committed to uninterrupted fuel shipments and discussed civil nuclear cooperation. Discussions also covered defense, manpower mobility, and India's UN Security Council bid, with leaders expressing satisfaction with the summit's outcomes.

title: Reverse kidney damage: A breakthrough treatment that may transform kidney treatment
description: A groundbreaking discovery offers hope for reversing kidney damage, challenging the notion that it's irreversible. Researchers found that blocking ceramides, fats linked to kidney cell injury, protected and restored normal function in animal trials. This breakthrough could shift kidney disease treatment from slowing decline to actively restoring health, potentially reducing the need for dialysis and transplantation.

title: Delhi: How digital ghost twice haunted man accused of killing his mother
description: A matricide suspect, Animesh Jha, who fled to Nepal five years ago on pandemic-era bail, has been apprehended at the Indo-Nepal border. Jha, a software engineer, allegedly murdered his mother in 2017 during a drug-fueled argument over finances. He was tracked down through electronic surveillance and lured back to India.

title: Putin to Trump? Russia ready for ‘uninterrupted fuel shipments’ to India
description: Amidst US sanctions on Russian oil majors, President Putin has assured India of consistent energy supplies, including oil, gas, and coal. This comes as India faces US pressure over its crude oil trade with Russia.  Beyond fossil fuels, Russia is also deepening collaboration with India in nuclear energy, transport logistics, and advanced technology sectors.

title: ‘Metaverse’ budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
description: Meta is reportedly planning to significantly cut its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its virtual reality ambitions. This move follows substantial losses and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence initiatives.

title: NBA trade rumors: Warriors may re-sign $190M guard to help Stephen Curry
description: Golden State Warriors are reportedly considering a reunion with former star Klay Thompson, now with the Dallas Mavericks. Amidst organizational shifts in Dallas and the Warriors' ongoing search for consistent three-point shooting, a trade for Thompson is being discussed. His return could bolster Golden State's offense and recapture championship magic.

title: Aryna Sabalenka & Georgios Frangulis net worth: Earnings, endorsements, business
description: Tennis star Aryna Sabalenka and her boyfriend, Oakberry founder Georgios Frangulis, are a financially successful couple. Sabalenka boasts a net worth in the high teens of millions from her WTA career and endorsements, while Frangulis's stake in his rapidly expanding açaí company places him in the multi-million-dollar range. Their combined wealth is estimated to be in the tens of millions.

title: Candace Owens slammed for ‘running scared’ from Charlie Kirk livestream
description: Candace Owens is facing criticism for contradicting herself. She publicly offered to debate Turning Point USA (TPUSA) leadership anytime, anywhere. However, when TPUSA scheduled a livestream to address her claims, Owens pushed back on the logistics. Critics accuse her of creating drama rather than accepting the challenge she initiated. The situation has become a test of consistency for the commentator.
